Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Two amulets (monkeys)
Description: Two amulets with each two differently treated surfaces: the first one is flat whereas the other depicts the profile of a dancing monkey playing the tambourine. The legs are bent, the hands holding the musical instrument are in front of the face, the tail dragging on the ground. A suspension ring is at the top of the head.
